name: 3" Custom Mickey Mouse Clown Vinylmation Pop Art toy and drawing
description:
Custom Art Toy 3" Vinylmation Mickey Mouse

With original drawing on package ACEO sized card

Based on the clown from the Big Top series

Finished with UV protective varnish

Original, by me, Howie Green

Comes with signed and dated Certificate of Authenticity

See lots more of my toys and art on my online gallery at www.hgd.com

Thanks for looking and have fun!

- Howie Green

COST INCLUDES SHIPPING WITHIN THE U.S.
For shipping outside the US contact me for costs. 

No shipping to Spain, Italy, Mexico, Central and South America.

name: Custom Vinylmation 9" Jerry Garcia Pop Art Toy by Howie Green
description:
Custom Painted Art Toy
9" Vinylmation Mickey Mouse
Acrylic and mixed media on vinyl toy
Finished with UV protective varnish

COMES WITH: Hat Guitar and ACEO Mixed Media Portrait on Canvas 

Original, hand-painted by me, Howie Green

Comes with signed and dated Certificate of Authenticity

Pop Art Mickey homage portrait to Mr. Garcia - his humor and talent are much missed.
